response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed to meet your specific needs. Given its value to you, I believe it's worth more than what others might be willing to pay. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I propose a price of $10,000 for this product. This price not only reflects its value but also provides a reasonable profit margin for us. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach an agreement that benefits both parties.", "product_price": 10000}
